item.title: About
item.content:encoded:
Iâ€™m Jamie McCarley, a Visual Designer based in Austin, TX.

Resume

Hello there! I'm Jamie, a recent graduate from the University of Oklahoma with a Bachelor of Fine Arts in Visual Communications. I'm thrilled to welcome you to my creative world!

Design has always been my passion. I see it as a tool to solve problems with boundless creativity. Whether it's crafting a captivating visual identity or solving a complex user experience puzzle, I relish the challenge and the opportunity to make a difference. I'm both a self-starter and a dedicated team player.

When I'm not immersed in the world of design, I'm an adventurer at heart. My recent travels, particularly a memorable trip to Switzerland, have ignited a deep love for exploring new places and cultures. These experiences fuel my creativity and inspire me to think outside the box.
